## ControlOverrides type

Get corresponding overrides object for a given TControl

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ControlOverrides<TForm extends object, TInputState extends object, TControl extends AbstractDynamicControl<any, any, any, any, any>> = TControl extends ControlFieldSchema<any, any> ? ControlFieldOverrides<TForm, TInputState, TControl> : TControl extends ControlArraySchema<any, any> ? ControlArrayOverrides<TForm, TInputState, TControl> : TControl extends ControlGroupSchema<any, any, any, any> ? ControlGroupOverrides<TForm, TInputState, TControl> : ControlFieldOverrides<TForm, TInputState, any>;
```
